properties.title: Subversion Access and Issue Tracking
properties.abstract: Outlines how to access the Subversion repository.

section.title: Issue Reporting and Tracking - JIRA
section.p: Please use JIRA for reporting any issue and tracking their progress. In addition, Jira offers many additonal (more sophisticated) features that allow you to keep in touch with the project's current progress.
Before submitting issues, please read 'How to submit an issue'.

section.title: Subversion access
section.p: The Codehaus hosts five active top level projects, including Castor itself (main) and a couple of sub-projects within Castor main. The source code, documentation and libraries of the top level projects are available from Subversion.
